first_translate: washing water... for drinking...?
is she serious right now?
she’s being so petty and childish about this.

hangle: 그래도 가문을 대표해서 전쟁터에서 5년을 산 사람한테… 정말로?
first_translate: and toward someone who represented her family on the battlefield for five years at that...
pfft!
haha! hahahaha!
I can’t help but laugh...
but I think I’ve seen that maid before somewhere...

hangle: 어디서 본 적이 있는 것 같은데…….
first_translate: where was it again...?
oh!
it was from five years ago.
the more you look at people like them, the clearer their nature becomes apparent.

hangle: 사생아라고 피오나를 끝없이 괴롭힌 백작부인의 하녀!
first_translate: this is the same maid who tormented me endlessly because I’m illegitimate!
that makes sense...

hangle: 방 하나 좀 제대로 줬다고 좀 방심하다니…
first_translate: I guess they’re still not taking me seriously even though they gave me my own room.

hangle: 이런 행동이 여전히 묵인되어 이루어진다는 건,
first_translate: if they allow such behavior,

hangle: 이 가문이 여전히 날 쓸모도 가치도 없는 사생아로 보고 있다는 뜻.
first_translate: then that must mean everyone here thinks I'm nothing but a useless bastard child.
apparently these people are under some sort of illusion.
apparently these people are under some sort of illusion.
to them, I am still just a powerless little girl...
...who has no money or place to go,

hangle: 아무런 힘도 없는 반쪽짜리 핏줄만 가진 열 세 살 사생아로 여기고 있어.
first_translate: a mere thirteen-year-old bastard child without any influence whatsoever.

hangle: 이런 식으로 환대해 주니 복수심이 다시 타오를 것 같네.
first_translate: treatment like this only fuels my desire for revenge.

hangle: 나야 그렇다치고 내내 고통 받았을 ‘피오나’를 생각하면 더……
first_translate: not just for myself, but also for “fiona,” who suffered all those years--

hangle: 이대로 두는 건 아닌 것 같아.
first_translate: I don’t think I’ll let things stay as they are anymore.
what was your name again?
what was your name again?
allen, miss.
good, allen.
I remember seeing you around back then too.
come to think of it,

hangle: 이 하녀는 나와 똑바로 눈을 마주친다.
first_translate: this maid looks straight into my eyes when speaking to me.

hangle: 일반적인 귀족 집안이라면 쉬이 허용될 리 없는 일이야.
first_translate: in most noble households, something like that would never happen.
as for why she acts so carelessly,

hangle: 백작 부인의 총애를 믿고, 그녀의 의사를 대변하고 있기 때문이겠지.
first_translate: it’s probably because she believes she has the support of the countess and speaks on behalf of her.

hangle: 백작 부인은 원래도 나를 혐오스럽게 여겼으니…
first_translate: countess green always hated me anyway...

hangle: 상속 문제가 있는 지금은 더더욱 내가 눈엣가시로 보일 거다.
first_translate: now that there’s the issue of succession, I bet she sees me as a bigger threat than ever.

hangle: 천한 사생아에게 보석 한 알이라도 빼앗길까,
first_translate: everyone in house green will do whatever it takes...

hangle: 그녀뿐 아니라 그린 가문 전체가 그걸로 전전긍긍하고 있을 테지.
first_translate: ...so that not a single jewel falls into the hands of a lowly bastard child like me.
why isn’t she reacting?

hangle: 이 멍청한 사생아가 설마 본인이 모욕당한 줄도 모르는 건가?
first_translate: doesn’t this stupid brat know how insulting this is?
let me make it clear.

hangle: 백작 부인은 눈물을 쏙 빼서 쫓아내기를 원하신다.
first_translate: lady green wants to see you cry tears of despair before kicking you out.
fiona green,

hangle: 고작해야 이제 갓 성인이 된 여자애.
first_translate: you may have become an adult recently,

hangle: 운 좋게 살아 돌아와선 가문에 빌붙을 생각인가본데,
first_translate: but if you think you can come crawling back home after getting lucky enough to survive war,
forget it!

hangle: 천한 사생아 따위… 넌 나에 대한 마님의 신임을 두텁게 해줄 기회에 불과해.
first_translate: an inferior bastard child like yourself... is merely an opportunity for me to gain lady green’s trust.

hangle: 이 가문에 네 자리따윈 없다는 걸 똑똑히 알려주지!
first_translate: I'll show you once and for all that you have no place in this household!
allen.
I understand what you want.
wh-what do you mean by that?
hmph.

hangle: 고작 이 정도로 울기라도 하려는 건가?
first_translate: do you really think crying over something like this will change anything?

hangle: 자기가 진짜 귀족이라고 착각하고 있던 거 아니…
first_translate: or did you actually believe you were part of the nobility--?
wait...
did she just...
hit me...?!

hangle: 내내 기죽어서 저택 바닥을 기어 다니던 그 피오나 따위가?!
first_translate: from the way she used to cower around the manor, I thought she’d continue acting submissively forever!
like I said yesterday,

hangle: 난 이 집안이 변하지 않은 것 같아서 기뻐.
first_translate: I’m glad to find that nothing much has changed since coming back.
th-this is outrageous!!!
allen.
do you realize where you went wrong?
this doesn’t feel right... normally, bastards like herself wouldn’t dare act up against us maids...
she’s smiling, yet somehow,
I get this suffocating sensation of fear!

hangle: 이렇게 숨 막히는 공포가 느껴지는 걸까?!
first_translate: I get this suffocating sensation of fear!
y-young mistress...

hangle: 이러면 곤란해지는 건 피오나 아가씨 일걸요?
first_translate: aren’t you going to regret doing this later?
I shall report everything to lady green immediately!
when she finds out,
she won’t sit idl--
argh!
I asked you what you did wrong.
allen, what exactly did you bring me?
i-it’s...
...your washing w-water, young mistress...
aaaghk!
oof...
wh-what kind of sorcery is this?! i-is this magic?!
what are you waiting for, allen?
answer me already.
I asked you what you did wrong.
if you refuse to answer properly,

hangle: 내가 지내온 헤일론의 방식으로 대화를 나눠볼까.
first_translate: maybe we could try having our conversation the hailon way instead.

hangle: 헤일론에선 함부로 주인에게 입을 놀리는 사용인의 혀를 자르고는 해.
first_translate: back in hailon, servants who speak rudely to their masters often lose their tongues.
how does punishment work in the capital?
uhh...
dear me...

hangle: 말이 없으니 어쩔 수 없이 헤일론의 방식대로 혀를 자를까?
first_translate: since you aren’t saying anything, perhaps I should cut off your tongue the hailon way?
my-my apologies...
ngh!
allen.
who am I?

hangle: 그, 그린 백작가의 피오나 아가씨 이십니다…….
first_translate: y-you are lady fiona of house green...
then tell me what you need to do.

hangle: 두, 두 번 다시 주제넘은 짓은 하지 않겠습니다.
first_translate: I-I promise to behave appropriately from now on.
please forgive m-me...
exactly. good job remembering.
do you feel better now?

hangle: 당장 가서 이 사실을 마님께 보고하자.
first_translate: go ahead and run along to inform lady green about this incident.
I’m sure...
...she’ll take action upon hearing about it!
where are you going?
I need to clean this mess up first.
listen carefully.
next time you decide to play another trick on me,

hangle: 그땐 정말 대가를 치러야 할 거야.
first_translate: be prepared to face the consequences.
I hope you understood that clearly.
